lead_paragraph: The government of Xinjiang, the restive, predominantly Muslim region, said it had adopted what appeared to be a sweeping law barring the spread of views deemed to threaten national unity.
snippet: The government of Xinjiang, the restive, predominantly Muslim region, said it had adopted what appeared to be a sweeping law barring the spread of views deemed to threaten national unity.

headline.main: China: Xinjiang Enacts a Curb on Dissent
headline.print_headline: China: Xinjiang Enacts a Curb On Dissent
